'''Countless Homes Light Up the Moon''' is a [[Furnishing]] item that can be used in the [[Serenitea Pot]].

The blueprint for Countless Homes Light Up the Moon is obtainable by buying the Gnostic Chorus package of the [[Battle Pass/Rhythm and Rhyme|Rhythm and Rhyme]] Battle Pass.

==Creation==
First time creation grants {{Item|Trust|24|x=90}}.
